Question: What significant events are associated with Paul Castellano and Sparks Steak House?
Options:
A. a) Paul Castellano was the boss of the Gambino family.
B. b) Paul Castellano was murdered outside Sparks Steak House.
C. c) Sparks Steak House is known for its connection to organized crime.
D. d) Paul Castellano was a prominent figure in the Gambino family.
Answer: a) Paul Castellano was the boss of the Gambino family., b) Paul Castellano was murdered outside Sparks Steak House., d) Paul Castellano was a prominent figure in the Gambino family.
